definition: to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
Look out for yourself, or heaven and earth will combine to destroy you./Every man for himself, and the Devil take the hindmost.
pinyin: ren2 bu4 wei4 ji3 , tian1 zhu1 di4 mie4

sentences.english: Everyone for himself and the devil take the hindmost—this is the bourgeois point of view on life.
sentences.chinese: “人不爲己，天誅地滅”，這是資產階級的人生觀。

sentences.english: Every man for himself, and the devil takes the hindmost .
sentences.chinese: 本來是想到人不爲己，天誅地滅的，但又覺得不太對。
